website_summaries.verdict: A handsome, durable unit that is easy to move around and provides a fair bit of work space.
pros: There's something very sturdy and well engineered about the appearance, as if wooden planks have been attached to construction girders
Casters that lock into place make it easy to move around
cons: Its height doesn't make it usable as a sitting desk for longer periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Nice workstation
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble assembling by myself, others here had a great tip to leave everything a little loose until it is all together. Very solid feeling. Reasons for 4 stars - the way it was packed the legs were inserted but fully collapsed and were scuffed a bit, and to adjust it is difficult as it requires some disassembly. I don't plan to adjust much so I would recommend it if you are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Primer

customer_reviews.title: Loft or Flat - Mobile desk for those who want a flexible living and work space. Surprisingly smooth locking plastic wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Solid with decent wheels! Slightly Textured Surface. The wheels are terrific for Loft or Apartment use where moving a desk around is advantageous. Nice IMAC platform for musician who want to move a recording console around the apparent or rehearsal or recording space. Bottom base for stability is also a nice foot stand. A very good price for a highly functional computer desk.
customer_reviews.author: banjobkp

customer_reviews.title: I love my desk
customer_reviews.text: I love my desk! First one came with two holes that the screw's wouldn't fit into so had to send it back.. Second one came quickly and was very excited!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherDionne

customer_reviews.title: Burn Calories & Save Your Back Stress!
customer_reviews.text: Saved by back! Hours of sitting at work caused strain to my back and this awesome desk plus a mat saved my back. No more back pain after a few days of alternate standing & sitting. My employer even purchased a few for the office. The benefits of burning extra calories standing versus sitting was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made desk and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Did not take too long to assemble this desk, the desk is well designed, and on the highest setting the desk is at a good height for average size person. Upgraded to larger/softer wheels for hardwood floors, and purchased higher Workpro Quantum 9000 chair to sit at the desk so that I don't need to adjust desk up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Great Sit Down Desk as Well
customer_reviews.text: This stand up desk works well as a sit down desk as well. I drilled the extra holes to put the crossbar in. I built this in the big room and then tried to roll it into my small 5 foot space the bottom shelf was too big to pass through the door, had to remove the shelf and reinstall inside the room. It is the best desk I have owned so far very sturdy and fits every thing perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Fargnoli

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Lotsnof work area space and Solid Built!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction! A little bigger than I expected but it looks and feels durable! I love it! The casters are huge and can handle the weight if the table well! Height not easily adjustable, decide which height to use during assembly, changing the height later on will prove to be a challenge! All in all very satisfied with the built and design!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Calabia

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk!!!! I've been using it for over a year and I feel great. It does shake a little bit when you're a heavy typer but not too bad. I like the wheels so I can move it around as needed. I use a bar height office chair with it for when I do need to sit. And I have a memory foam kitchen mat for when I stand.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisa10

customer_reviews.title: Utilitarian
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this desk for a week now. It has been a great solution for a standing desk setup. I use it in tandem with a drafting stool, which gives me the option to sit or stand. I can't say that I have any complaints. It's solid and quite spacious. Adjusting it would certainly be a chore, but since I'm the only one using it, I don't think I'll ever need to adjust it anyway. I find the wheels to be unnecessary, but I'm sure someone finds them useful. Overall, it's very utilitarian, but function over form is always preferable in an office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easily adjustable. Sturdy though.
customer_reviews.text: Not good in a shared office setting. Reason: Not adjustable without great effort using a hex driver wrench and at least two people. Once it is set for height that is it. No adjustment between monitor shelf and keyboard shelf. Assembly ease was OK but instructions did not prevent one mistake. After Assembly the product is very sturdy and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Candoris

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy! Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is so sturdy and built well. I highly recommend. First I have to laugh at paying $100 to have this put together. I can’t build anything and I put it together in 20 minutes. It was so easy.. It’s great for me because it fits my computer laptop monitor and printer. I wheel it to the living room to work them wheel it to my closet when done. My printer is very big and it fits
customer_reviews.author: Dnicemili

customer_reviews.title: easy adjustment of height
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well. The only drawback is that the shelves don't have a capability that allows rapid, easy adjustment of height, so that the desk can be used for standing and then adjusted for sitting, without having to dissassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small workstation
customer_reviews.text: The desk was very easy to put together and included all the parts. In fact, They were extra bolts of every size just to make sure there was enough hardware. I’m very pleased with the quality of part, the machinery and how solid the desk feels.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: I built it by myself!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you everyone that responded to my questions. I received the desk today and by 6p my desk was up & functional. It took about an hour to build the desk including to adjusting the keyboard height a couple of times. What took me the longest was mounting a dual monitor stand I added to raise the monitor to my eye level (separate review but part my desk so I counted the time all together). The desk was easy to build and stable. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Music

customer_reviews.title: Much better solution than a traditional workstation for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I was assigned to deliver a 6 week virtual class via WebEx. After one day at a traditional workstation I bought this. Absolutely love being able to stand, pace and work :) I am a training consultant and find that especially when delivering content I feel more comfortable standing rather than sitting. It is sturdy, adjustable (no on the fly, you have to take everything off and adjust with an allen wrench) and has wheels.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Stand up desk on rollers.
customer_reviews.text: I just got my stand up desk and I simply love it. Sturdy, looks great, holds my dual monitors, desktop and an audio receiver. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Keshishyan

customer_reviews.title: Great standup desk! Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the 40" desk. Enough room for keyboard, mouse and room to write on the lower shelf. Have oversized monitor and my laptop on the top. I left off the castors as I don't plan on rolling it around. But the big thing is that, unlike the adjustable one that I had before - this does not move when I type, lean on it, etc. etc. I don't sit at at so didn't need adjustable - if you don't either I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Melody B

customer_reviews.title: Just what we ordered. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Looks good. Work space is wide enough for keyboard and laptop together. Some unbolting and reassembly is required to adjust keyboard/monitor height, but we knew that when we purchased it. Warning! If you need to frequently adjust the height, don't buy this. Otherwise, I would not hesitate to recommend this one to a friend. Assembly instructions are clear. One-person assembly is do-able, but much easier with two.
customer_reviews.author: whogabra

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy desk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk for work because I needed something bigger and sturdier than what I have. This definitely fits the bill! It's gorgeous and has so much space. The steel has a nice weight to it and it's pretty easy to set up, even with one person.
customer_reviews.author: Rj Dino

customer_reviews.title: Really like this desk
customer_reviews.text: Really like this desk. I have to sit all day at work so I hate coming home and sitting again if I'm going to be on the computer at night(which I always am). It arrived with one of the welds broken and the company shipped me a replacement frame immediately. Pretty easy to put together but having a second person for some steps would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Fildes

customer_reviews.title: Good, stay away if tall
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend if you are 5'8-5'9 or taller, the desk's highest level is simply not high enough to be ideal. My comparison is my standing desk at work. I am 5'10 and presently use this desk as a seated one which it is fine at. Quality is fine, and the two levels (e.g. one for screen, keyboard down below) is important.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Well made and stable
customer_reviews.text: I needed something so I do not sit all day and this perfect. It is well made, and very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Peele

customer_reviews.title: The table is excellent and needs some work for assembly but not difficult
customer_reviews.text: The table is excellent and needs some work for assembly but not difficult. The only downside to this table is that it can't be adjusted from standing to sitting easily. I bought it for my brother who has a bad back. So he has a hard time sitting for long periods of time. He didn't want to be standing or sitting the entire time. Unfortunately he can't adjust this table to go from standing to sitting and back throughout the day. But nonetheless still loves the desk and uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Mattathil

customer_reviews.title: Great stand up desk for office
customer_reviews.text: Great desk ! I wanted a stand up desk for work. This was exactly as expected. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE PRODUCT/QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. I am a 5.1 and put it together alone. It took me a like an hour an a half. The table is easy to move, it is spacious and great quality. So far, I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the quality
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I didnt care for was that you have to unscrew the sides to raise and lower the desk top surface. I like the quality, design, and space.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Flagg

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and fits dual monitors
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'2" and this desk works great. Solid construction and easy to roll around. The manufacturer should invest in 3 little stickers to label the desk top pieces to make set up stress free.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend for, I am 5 foot 9 inches and I raised the desk up all the way so that my wrist are not at a such a sharp bend, taller persons should purchase a taller desk.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Barnett

customer_reviews.title: I like mine
customer_reviews.text: Better for a persons health to work this way. Encourages one to get it done and move on to other things.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with product. Assembly was easy with very easy to read directions. Missing a couple of screws, but customer service was very quick, friendly, and easy and will have them to me in 2-3 days! WOW...couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Chaisson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This standing desk is perfect for the light duty environment we are using it for. Assembly was reasonably easy, although at one point it took two of us to manipulate the thing, which was a bit awkward. It is big enough to hold our desktop computer, monitor, keyboard, mouse, a few label printers and a scale. Shelving below the desktop would be an improvement for storage. For the money I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Pick your height but don’t plan on frequent adjustments
customer_reviews.text: You can adjust the height but not with regularity as it involves removing everything from the desk and requires two people to adjust. Otherwise the desk is great.
customer_reviews.author: AND

customer_reviews.title: Great solution!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, solid, stable, great price, couldn't ask for more. Reasonable to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cox

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, very sturdy, easy to adjust and move around.
customer_reviews.author: arianne spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and maneuverable
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a yr, and very pleased with functionality and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good and sturdy desk
customer_reviews.text: It's a good and sturdy desk. Assembly went well, too. Note that its height is only adjustable when you're assembling the thing. If you want to change its height after you've used it a while, you need to empty the desk, get a friend, and get the allen wrench again. Definitely not something you can adjust easily on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and Economical - helped one of the guys in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great and Economical - helped one of the guys in our office, after he threw out his back and couldn't sit for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Renee L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stand-up Desk
customer_reviews.text: The Perfect Stand-up desk for beginners! Very sturdy and easy to move around in office. Recommend installing with 2 people, otherwise was easy to follow by directions. It's large enough to hold 24" monitor and pc with docking station and extra room for notebook and phone. We'll worth the money and would recommend for anyone wanting to try a stand-up desk.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Clemons

customer_reviews.title: It is bigger that I expected
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent if you are in need of a rolling desk
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Well built unit easy to move around and plenty of work space.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality desk is incredibly sturdy. Perfect height for either a standing desk or with a bar height stool. Great and durable finish has held up well so far. Feels very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Good overall design. Not easily adjustable but that was not what i was looking for in a stand up desk. Feels solid. Room for all I need to type comprehensive reports. While on wheels, the unit may not fit through narrower (30" or less) interior doors.
customer_reviews.author: William Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is amazing, I totally love it! Was easy to put together, and has surfaces large enough to accommodate what I need around my keyboard. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tigers

customer_reviews.title: This desk is great. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This desk is great. Easy to assemble, very sturdy, very solid shelves and the wheels make the desk easy to move. The desk has met all of my expectations; a good value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleenz1

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my standing desk
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my standing desk! Great quality for the price. Shipping was prompt, and the assembly was not complicated. Assembled it by myself, but it would go faster with a helping hand. Easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: I wish the height could be adjusted more easily. Lining up the holes on both sides is ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the height could be adjusted more easily. Lining up the holes on both sides is a difficult task without someone helping you.Other than that, the wheels are nice and large and the desk feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ruggeberg

customer_reviews.title: Stand up / Sit down without cost of adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Easy to assemble. Rolls easily. With a wireless mouse and keyboard, and long cord for monitor - easy to switch from traditional desk to this stand-up.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great desk...perfect size and very nice looking in my home office
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured, easy to assemble and seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made for tall people
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit anyone over 5'8". Very misleading not to have this documented in the product description. Reasonable quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, just don't recommend for taller people.
customer_reviews.text: It did the job fine but if you are a taller person, I wouldn't suggest it. They do give you clear guidance on how high up the keyboard area is so it's on me for still buying it. The keyboard is just too low for comfortable typing and my mouse moves all around because I can't rest my wrists on it. I'll be doing some modifications to lift this up higher. I'm 6-2 if that helps anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and sturdy desk that is great for small spaces. Easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gorbett

customer_reviews.title: This was relatively easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was relatively easy to assemble. It helps organize my office and looks good. I recommend this to anyone who wants a stand-up workstation.
customer_reviews.author: Reader Reviews

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble alone
customer_reviews.text: quality product, clear instructions, easy to assemble alone. couldn't ask for more
customer_reviews.author: austin welch

customer_reviews.title: Good Desk
customer_reviews.text: Very good, solid desk. It could be improved by having some way to adjust the height without taking out the screws and support bar.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my computer station. Allows me to be more productive.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk! Plenty of room and the height is just right (adjustable).
customer_reviews.author: Heather.Matzdorf

customer_reviews.title: Not for Dwarfs
customer_reviews.text: I got this because Snow White was looking for a work station for one of her friends. Apparently he didn't like it because she said he was Grumpy.
customer_reviews.author: KenAdams

customer_reviews.title: Table under edge are kinda sharp, unable to adjust up and down
customer_reviews.text: The table is very sturdy but the only issue I have is the table under edges are sharp, if they smooths the under edge would be great. Another thing if they can make it manually adjustable the height to up and down, this table will be perfect. I'm looking forward to their new design with round edges and manual adjustable up and down. If they have it, I will definitely purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Marttie

customer_reviews.title: It’s time to stand up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to a basic sit down desk. Only issue is that you have to take everything off of the desk in order to manually adjust the height. I was hoping for a lever to use for quick height adjustments. However, I do enjoy standing while working so it’s been great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hackett

customer_reviews.title: and very sturdy. It's not easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Easy-to-assemble, and very sturdy. It's not easily adjustable, but that's not something I was looking for. At this AWESOME price, that's an easy sacrifice to make. My MacBook Pro, 27" second monitor and medium-sized reference speakers fit just fine... plenty of room. The ONLY thing I can think of that would improve this desk would be to have some sort of – either built-in, or add-on – storage. A shelf kit or matching file cabinet to go on the bottom shelf would be awesome. That said, I have used magnets to attach some simple pen holders, desk organizers and clips for paper and notes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Page

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks nice too.
customer_reviews.text: I put it together by myself with only the tools included in the package in a little more than an hour - but I wasn't in a hurry. It looks nice and it is sturdy. A bit of advice, put it together in the room you plan to use it in otherwise you will have to take it apart or take the door off of the room in order for it to fit thru the doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stable - Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and Stable. Big enough to handle my 27" Monitor, two laptops (one on upper level and one on lower) Keyboard and Mouse. I really thought it was too big until I started setting everything up and found it was almost perfect. Moves easily good quality and I expect it to last as long as I need it. The only issue I had was finding the "wrench" that was included. Finally found it after I didn't need it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: W. R. James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy design, should have gottem the larger one. But I can put a bigger desktop on it myself so it's no big deal. Great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Stand Up Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this investment! Delivery was pretty quick. This is a very durable desk! It was a bit of a challenge with assembly but I managed. It wouldn't hurt to get an extra hand. I use this desk more than my traditional desk. I also purchased a Core Twist Abdominal-Trimming Foot-Reflexology Disc so that I may get a bit of a workout while working.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and affordable, with space for dual monitors
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this desk for remote work. It has the space for a two monitor set up, and was pretty straightforward to assemble. The price was lower than most other options of that size, and quality seems great so far!! The best economical option I found!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Received today and put together. Very disappointed in the fact is more than an inconvenience in adjusting it. It takes at least two people.
customer_reviews.author: Blackmoon

customer_reviews.title: Life-saving work station!
customer_reviews.text: This work station has saved my life! I have spine issues and can no longer sit for a long time. It is durable, cost effective and there's a lot of room for everything I use. My husband said it was easy to assemble and he mounted two monitors to the desk. I highly recommend this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kia Glenn

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly what you see in the picture 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: We have four at the office that we’ve bought over the course of the last few years and they’ve all last wonderfully. The instructions make it super easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ione

customer_reviews.title: This stand up computer desk is just perfect for all my needs
customer_reviews.text: This stand up computer desk is just perfect for all my needs. It's roomy, and it's comfortable placement for my hands. I use it with my LifeSpan treadmill. Only thing, I had to remove the bottom piece of the stand so that the treadmill would fit all the way under it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, however before I could use it my husband had to repair two welds on it. For this price I would have expected better quality. I would've returned it for a refund however it's so big and bulky it was just too much trouble so I had my husband who is a mechanic fix it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just do it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a couple months into using the standing desk now, and it's become very natural. I'm 6'2" and the maximum height for the desk is perfect for me. If I could change one thing, it would be to make the horizontal support bar a little higher to fit my admittedly enormous CPU (4 more inches higher would've worked) but as is I keep my beastly computer sideways behind the bars and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Watrach Jr.

customer_reviews.title: it’s a great desk.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a five if it was easier to adjust up and down. Otherwise, it’s a great desk.
customer_reviews.author: Papasan

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very Solid and easy to assemble. I am using with a 17" Dell Laptop and a 27" iMa. Even though the desk width is 40" both fit very well. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk, highy recommend
customer_reviews.text: Went together so easy, I was SO happy! :) This is a heavy duty desk, for the price point it is a bargain! Rolls very smoothly and is wide enough that I don't feel cramped. I have two large monitors on the back stand, perfect for my work.
customer_reviews.author: kittyann

customer_reviews.title: Love the desk
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk, thanks for getting it to me quickly. Only reason it is not a 5 of 5 is that you all should build a mechanism in to lower it much easier than removing screws etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey T Goodridge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Worked out perfectly by allowing me to stand up and stretch a little while using my 3rd job computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Texas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials and much larger than I had expected. A perfect work area!
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good simple standup desk
customer_reviews.text: Good simple standup desk. I use it for a lab. Beware the computer shelve at the bottom has limited height under the cross member. I cannot fit my 10yr old Dells. My newer desktops do fit. Just.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: I love working standing up now
customer_reviews.text: I love working standing up now! I have to sit down every now and then because it does get a little tiring, but I feel more productive while working and standing, which I didn't expect.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised but is slightly wobbly and you cannot adjust the height of the desk with anything on it. I like it, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ben + Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cheap standing desk I was able to find and I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Stormcrow

customer_reviews.title: Great desk but it takes a while to assemble it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great desk but it takes a while to assemble it on your own (some aspects of the instructions are unclear). Like other raters, it'd have been nice if it could be adjusted easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Assembly was not too difficult. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Michael Falco

customer_reviews.title: I love my desk --i have to sit occasionally but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my desk --i have to sit occasionally but I think it is better than sitting all day !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: Great solid desk. Very reasonable price. Friendly service. Very easy to put together, tools included to assemble desk.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: You need to wear comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Standing helps my stamina as I jog and walk and I feel that it helps my mid section. You need to wear comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful. Check the description
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. Not worth the price. The description is not quite right. The distance between the high and low tops is fixed, not variable although the description led me to believe that they are. Once you open and begin the assembly, you are stuck. This is a very heavy product. Trying to repackage and return is just impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R Sanichara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have been using it for several months. It is perfect for what I need. It holds my monitor, notebook, mouse, keypad perfectly. Putting it together was actually pretty simple. I could suggest to the manufacturer one enhancement, to provide a post for setting the height. That part really takes two people. Most reasonably priced, nice looking, comfortable desk out there!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Adney Heater

product_meta.title: 40" Black Shelves Mobile Ergonomic Stand Up Desk Computer Workstation
feature_bullets: This innovative standing desk promotes better posture, reduced back and neck pain, a thinner waist line and increased productivity. Overall dimensions: 39.4” W x 28.8" D x 34.1” to 46.1” H. Weight Capacity: 154 lbs, evenly distributed.
Height of lower and upper shelves adjusts at 1" increments
The two tier shelf design puts your monitor at the proper viewing height and the keyboard and mouse at the proper working height
The silver gray powder coat paint finish is heavy duty ensuring years of use

Moving the stand up workstation from room to room is easy with the 3" furniture casters, and the desk locks into place with two locking brakes. This product meets the minimum requirements of ANSI/BIFMA standards.
